Sinopse: "The Bromley Boys" is a funny yet touching coming-of-age football memoir played out to the sights and sounds of late-'60s Britain. Based on the hilarious novel by Dave Roberts, it recounts the author's highs and lows of supporting the worst football team in the country at the time: Bromley FC.—TJ Herbert
